nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the CoGateway contract address. This can be called only by
        an organization address. This can be set only once.
     * @param _coGatewayAddress CoGateway contract address
     * @return success_ `true` if CoGateway address was set
nodes.name: setCoGateway

nodes.documentation:
@notice Increases the total token supply. Also, adds the number of
        tokens to the beneficiary balance.
     * @param _account Account address for which the balance will be increased.
This is payable so that it provides flexibility of
                transferring base token to account on increase supply.
@param _amount Amount of tokens.
     * @return success_ `true` if increase supply is successful, false otherwise.
nodes.name: increaseSupply
decreaseSupply

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if an address exists.
     * @dev For standard ethereum all account addresses exist by default,
     so it returns true for all addresses.
     * @return exists_ `true` for all given address
nodes.name: exists

nodes.documentation:
@notice Internal function to decrease the token supply.
     * @dev Decreases the token balance from the msg.sender address and
     decreases the total token supply count.
     * @param _amount Amount of tokens.
     * @return success_ `true` if decrease supply is successful, false otherwise.
nodes.name: decreaseSupplyInternal

@notice Internal function to decrease the token supply.
     * @dev Decreases the token balance from the msg.sender address and
     decreases the total token supply count.
     * @param _amount Amount of tokens.
     * @return success_ `true` if decrease supply is successful, false otherwise.
nodes.name: decreaseSupplyInternal

allowance(address,address).return: allowance_ Remaining allowance for the spender to spend from                   owner's account.

approve(address,uint256).details: Allows _spender address to withdraw from function caller's account,     multiple times up to the _value amount, if this function is called     again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.

params._spender: Address authorized to spend from the function caller's                 address.
params._value: Amount up to which spender is authorized to spend.

approve(address,uint256).return: bool `true` for a successful approval, `false` otherwise.

balanceOf(address).return: balance_ Account balance of the owner account.

params._organization: Address of a contract that manages organization.

decreaseSupply(uint256).return: success_ `true` if decrease supply is successful, false otherwise.

exists(address).details: For standard ethereum all account addresses exist by default,     so it returns true for all addresses.

params._account: Account address for which the balance will be increased. This is payable so that it provides flexibility of                transferring base token to account on increase supply.

increaseSupply(address,uint256).return: success_ `true` if increase supply is successful, false otherwise.

setCoGateway(address).return: success_ `true` if CoGateway address was set

totalSupply().details: Get totalTokenSupply as view so that child cannot edit.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Fires the transfer event, throws if, _from account does not have     enough tokens to spend.

params._to: Address to which tokens are transferred.
params._value: Amount of tokens to be transferred.

transfer(address,uint256).return: success_ `true` for a successful transfer, `false` otherwise.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allows a contract to transfer tokens on behalf of _from address     to _to address, the function caller has to be pre-authorized for     multiple transfers up to the total of _value amount by the _from     address.

params._from: Address from which tokens are transferred.
params._to: Address to which tokens are transferred.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: success_ `true` for a successful transfer, `false` otherwise.

devdoc.title: UtilityToken is an EIP20Token and implements UtilityTokenInterface.

allowance(address,address).notice: Public function to get the allowance.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Public function to approve an account for transfer.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the balance of an account.

decimals().notice: Public function to get the decimals of the token.

increaseSupply(address,uint256).notice: Increases the total token supply. Also, adds the number of        tokens to the beneficiary balance.

name().notice: Public function to get the name of the token.

setCoGateway(address).notice: Sets the CoGateway contract address. This can be called only by        an organization address. This can be set only once.

symbol().notice: Public function to get the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().notice: Public function to get the total supply of the tokens.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Public function to transfer the token.

userdoc.notice: This contract has increaseSupply and decreaseSupply functions that         can be called only by CoGateway.
